entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 3 cm north of Port Hope Simpson. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
